author: unknown
message:

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,5 @@
+from __future__ import print_function
+
 import json
 import sys
 import errno
@@ -609,7 +611,7 @@ def print_verbose(x):
   if not options.verbose:
     return
   if type(x) is str:
-    print x
+    print(x)
   else:
     pprint.pprint(x, indent=2)
